description: Polymer web component behavior for button state management, including properties, event handlers, and behaviors related to button interactions.

classes.name: Polymer.IronButtonStateImpl
classes.description: Implementation of button state behavior, including properties, event handlers, and observers for toggle and press states.

methods.name: _tapHandler
methods.description: Handles tap events to toggle active state if toggles property is true.

methods.name: _detectKeyboardFocus
methods.description: Detects if the element received focus via keyboard.

methods.name: _userActivate
methods.description: Activates or deactivates the button and fires change event.

methods.name: _downHandler
methods.description: Handles pointer down events, setting pointerDown and pressed states.

methods.name: _upHandler
methods.description: Handles pointer up events, resetting pointerDown and pressed states.

methods.name: __isFocusedLightDescendant
methods.description: Checks if a target element is a focused light descendant.

methods.name: _spaceKeyDownHandler
methods.description: Handles spacebar key down to emulate button press.

methods.name: _spaceKeyUpHandler
methods.description: Handles spacebar key up to trigger click if pressed.

methods.name: _pressedChanged
methods.description: Handles changes to the pressed property.

methods.name: _ariaActiveAttributeChanged
methods.description: Handles changes to the ariaActiveAttribute property.

methods.name: _activeChanged
methods.description: Handles changes to the active property and updates ARIA attributes.

methods.name: _controlStateChanged
methods.description: Handles changes to control state, especially when disabled.

methods.name: _changedButtonState
methods.description: Hook for subclasses or behaviors to react to button state changes.
